start.text: Countless stars light the sky again today.
Your willingness to fight by my side is admirable, but try not to overwork yourselves.

start_boss.text: There will be no obstacle you cannot overcome.
'Tis an ordeal to overcome, for them and for us.

retreat.text: It is too dangerous for us.

out_of_missiles.text: We must adapt in light of this setback.

engaged.text: If you move in haste, you are bound to miss certain things.
There is no obstacle we may not overcome.

need_help.text: The circumstances are too dangerous for us, it would seem.

running.text: It must have been too much for my crew. Well done enduring it thus far.

hull_50.text: No one will blame you, crew.
Our armor managed to hold out for a good length of time.

hull_30.text: A star can only truly be seen in the darkness...
It was still too dangerous for us, I see...

overload.text: It must have been too much for us.

victory_boss.text: The closer to death one is, the freer one becomes.
